his indignation toward his enemies. The enemies of God are all those who persist, unrepentant, in their ways as natural men and women (Mosiah 3:19). Further, God's enemies are those who participate in the grosser sins, who encourage others in sin, and who fight against the right. God's indignation, meaning anger or wrath, will be known toward all such.
